to make something stronger, especially in order to protect it: a fortified townfortify something with something They hurriedly fortified the village with barricades of carts. The argument had fortified her resolve to prove she was right.fortify yourself with something He fortified himself with a drink and a sandwich before driving on.fortified with a fruit drink fortified with vitamin C (= with vitamin C added)
